name: Quiet Sands
description: New Year's resolution application. Uses Express, Express Handlebars, Passport, Sequelize, and MySQL.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather forecast application that uses a third party API (OpenWeather API) and local storage to save search history.

name: Pours In The Outdoors
description: Hiking application that allows users to find a hike then locate an area brewery.  Uses third party API's (OpenWeather, Zomato, and Hiking Project), JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
